title: Flipped Learning-Based Advanced Physiology Course: Project-Centered Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customized physiology education for working professionals in non-face-to-face/blended learning environments using digital devices. Innovative integration of flipped learning and project-based assessment systems

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate the ability to analyze physiological mechanisms of human systems and apply them to real-world cases (80%+ project achievement)

Based on physiology knowledge (respiratory, circulatory, nervous systems) acquired via an asynchronous learning platform (e.g., LMS), learners propose solutions to at least two of three complex problems (e.g., hypoxemia case studies) presented in synchronous discussion sessions (twice weekly). Their solutions must achieve â‰¥4 out of 5 points on a peer- and instructor-evaluation rubric (collaboration, knowledge application, problem-solving).
Learners enhance physiological data interpretation and visualization skills to professional application levels through individual project outputs
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
